mapper.select: SELECT tre.u_id AS refundId, tre.type, tre.refund_type AS refundType, tre.application_time AS applicationTime, tre.`status`, tre.price, tod.num, CASE tre.type WHEN 0 THEN ( SELECT CONCAT( tod.u_id, ",", tg.image_id, ",", if(tua.user_name is null,' ',tua.user_name) ) FROM t_order_detail tod, t_goods tg, t_user_address tua WHERE tre.child_order_id = tod.u_id AND tod.goods_id = tg.u_id AND tua.u_id = tod.address_id ) WHEN 1 THEN ( SELECT CONCAT( tti.u_id, ",", tg.image_id, ",", if(tua.user_name is null,' ',tua.user_name) ) FROM t_try_info tti, t_goods tg, t_user_address tua, t_goods_try tgt WHERE tre.child_order_id = tti.u_id AND tti.goods_id = tg.u_id AND tua.u_id = tgt.address_id AND tgt.u_id = tti.try_id ) ELSE ( SELECT CONCAT( tvo.u_id, ",", tv.record_id, ",", if(tua.user_name is null,' ',tua.user_name) ) FROM t_video_order tvo LEFT JOIN t_video tv ON tvo.video_id = tv.u_id LEFT JOIN t_user_address tua ON tua.u_id = tvo.address_id WHERE tre.child_order_id = tvo.u_id ) END AS array FROM t_refund_exchange tre,t_order_detail tod WHERE tre.shop_id = #{param.shopId} AND tre.`status`!=6 AND tod.u_id = tre.child_order_id ORDER BY tre.application_time DESC LIMIT #{pageIndex}, #{pageSize}
SELECT COUNT( tre.u_id ) FROM t_refund_exchange tre WHERE tre.shop_id = #{param.shopId} AND tre.`status`!=6

SELECT tre.u_id AS refundId, tod.u_id AS orderId, tod.num, tre.application_time AS applicationTime, tg.image_id AS imageSrc, tre.`status`, tre.price, tua.user_name AS userName, tre.refund_type AS refundType, tre.type FROM t_refund_exchange tre, t_order_detail tod, t_goods tg, t_user_address tua WHERE tre.type = 0 AND tod.shop_id = #{param.shopId} AND tre.child_order_id = tod.u_id AND tod.goods_id = tg.u_id AND tod.address_id = tua.u_id AND tre.`status`!=6 ORDER BY tre.application_time DESC LIMIT #{pageIndex}, #{pageSize}
SELECT COUNT(tre.u_id) FROM t_refund_exchange tre, t_order_detail tod WHERE tre.type = 0 AND tod.shop_id = #{param.shopId} AND tre.child_order_id = tod.u_id AND tre.`status`!=6

SELECT tre.u_id AS refundId, tti.u_id AS orderId, tre.application_time AS applicationTime, tg.image_id AS imageSrc, tre.`status`, tre.price, tua.user_name AS userName, tre.refund_type AS refundType, tre.type FROM t_refund_exchange tre, t_try_info tti, t_goods tg, t_user_address tua, t_goods_try tgt WHERE tre.type = 1 AND tti.shop_id = #{param.shopId} AND tre.child_order_id = tti.u_id AND tti.goods_id = tg.u_id AND tti.try_id = tgt.u_id AND tgt.address_id = tua.u_id AND tre.`status`!=6 ORDER BY tre.application_time DESC LIMIT #{pageIndex}, #{pageSize}
SELECT COUNT(tre.u_id) FROM t_refund_exchange tre, t_try_info tti WHERE tre.type = 1 AND tti.shop_id = #{param.shopId} AND tre.child_order_id = tti.u_id AND tre.`status`!=6

SELECT tre.u_id AS refundId, tvo.u_id AS orderId, tre.application_time AS applicationTime, tv.record_id AS videoSrc, tre.`status`, tre.price, tua.user_name AS userName, tre.refund_type AS refundType, tre.type FROM t_refund_exchange tre, t_video_order tvo, t_user_address tua, t_video tv WHERE tre.type = 2 AND tvo.shop_id = #{param.shopId} AND tre.child_order_id = tvo.u_id AND tvo.address_id = tua.u_id AND tvo.video_id = tv.u_id AND tre.`status`!=6 ORDER BY tre.application_time DESC LIMIT #{pageIndex}, #{pageSize}
SELECT COUNT(tre.u_id) FROM t_refund_exchange tre, t_video_order tvo WHERE tre.type = 2 AND tvo.shop_id = #{param.shopId} AND tre.child_order_id = tvo.u_id AND tre.`status`!=6

SELECT tre.u_id AS refundId, tre.type AS type, tre.content, tre.price, tre.application_time AS applicationTime, tre.deal_time AS dealTime, tre.refuse_reason AS reason, tre.refuse_image_id AS imageSrc, tre.remind_time 'remindTime', tl.`name` AS expressName, tre.express_number AS expressNumber, tre.`status`, tre.apply_image_id AS altImageSrc, tre.refund_type AS refundType, tu2.phone, tu.name, tu.`name` AS userName, tua.phone AS userPhone, tua.address AS userAddress, tod.num FROM t_user tu, t_user_address tua, t_order_detail tod, t_refund_exchange tre LEFT JOIN t_logistics tl ON tl.u_id = tre.express_id LEFT JOIN t_shop ts ON ts.u_id = tre.shop_id LEFT JOIN t_user tu2 ON tu2.u_id = ts.user_id WHERE tre.u_id = #{refundId} AND tre.user_id = tu.u_id AND tua.user_id = tre.user_id AND tod.u_id = tre.child_order_id GROUP BY tre.u_id

SELECT tre.u_id AS refundId, tre.type AS type, tre.content, tre.price, tre.application_time AS applicationTime, tre.deal_time AS dealTime, tre.refuse_reason AS reason, tre.refuse_image_id AS imageSrc, tre.remind_time 'remindTime', UNIX_TIMESTAMP( tre.remind_time ) AS remindTimeStamp, tl.`name` AS expressName, tre.express_number AS expressNumber, tre.`status`, tre.apply_image_id AS altImageSrc, tre.refund_type AS refundType, tu.open_id AS openId, tu.`name` AS userName, tua.phone AS userPhone, tua.address AS userAddress, tvo.num FROM t_user tu, t_user_address tua, t_video_order tvo, t_refund_exchange tre LEFT JOIN t_logistics tl ON tl.u_id = tre.express_id WHERE tre.u_id = #{refundId} AND tre.user_id = tu.u_id AND tua.user_id = tre.user_id AND tvo.u_id = tre.child_order_id GROUP BY tre.u_id

SELECT tre.u_id AS refundId, tre.type, tre.refund_type AS refundType, tre.`status`, UNIX_TIMESTAMP( tre.remind_time ) AS remindTime, tre.price, tg.compressId, tg.goods_name 'goodsName', tod.num, tgs.size, tgs.color FROM t_refund_exchange tre, t_order_detail tod, t_goods tg, t_goods_specification tgs WHERE tre.user_id = #{param.userId} AND tre.`status`!=4 AND tre.child_order_id = tod.u_id AND tod.goods_id = tg.u_id AND tod.goods_spec_id = tgs.u_id ORDER BY tre.application_time DESC LIMIT #{pageIndex}, #{pageSize}
SELECT COUNT(tre.u_id) FROM t_refund_exchange tre WHERE tre.type = 0 AND tre.user_id = #{param.userId} AND tre.`status`!=4

SELECT tre.u_id AS refundId, tre.refund_type AS refundType, tre.type, tv.record_id AS videoSrc, ts.`name` AS shopName, tre.`status`, tvo.price, tvo.size, tvo.num FROM t_refund_exchange tre LEFT JOIN ( t_video_order tvo, t_video tv, t_shop ts ) ON tre.child_order_id = tvo.u_id AND tvo.video_id = tv.u_id AND tvo.shop_id = ts.u_id WHERE tre.type = 2 AND tre.user_id = #{param.userId} AND tre.`status`!=6 ORDER BY tre.application_time DESC LIMIT #{pageIndex}, #{pageSize}
SELECT COUNT(tre.u_id) FROM t_refund_exchange tre WHERE tre.type = 2 AND tre.user_id = #{param.userId} AND tre.`status`!=6
SELECT ts.`name`, tu.phone, ts.address FROM t_refund_exchange tre LEFT JOIN t_shop ts ON tre.shop_id = ts.u_id LEFT JOIN t_user tu ON ts.user_id = tu.u_id WHERE tre.u_id = #{orderId}

SELECT tre.u_id AS id, tre.child_order_id AS orderId, ( tre.price * ifnull(tod.num, 1) ) AS price, tre.type, tre.`status` FROM t_refund_exchange tre LEFT JOIN t_order_detail tod ON tre.child_order_id = tod.u_id WHERE tre.`status` = 2 GROUP BY tre.u_id
